name: kinda-pdf-document
description: Easily generate any kind of PDF documents such as reports including headers, footers, tables, etc.
author: Manuel Vila <mvila@3base.com>

scripts.release: npm run lint && npm test && (git checkout --quiet master && test -z "$(git status --porcelain)" && npm version $npm_config_release_type && git push --follow-tags) || echo "An error occured (unclean repository?)"
